SEARCH
Module edu.ntnu.stud
Package edu.ntnu.stud.models

Interface Transform2D

All Known Implementing Classes:
AffineTransform2D, JuliaTransform
public interface Transform2D
This interface represents a 2D transformation. It provides a method to transform a 2D vector. Implementations of this interface can define their own specific transformations, such as affine transformations or Julia transformations.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Vector2D
    transform(Vector2D vec)
    Transforms the given 2D vector according to the specific transformation defined by the implementation.

  • Method Details

    • transform

      Vector2D transform(Vector2D vec)
      Transforms the given 2D vector according to the specific transformation defined by the implementation.
      Parameters:
      vec - the 2D vector to be transformed
      Returns:
      the transformed 2D vector
